summary: A Member of Nexus requested prettier, more ornate Axe and Pick with a reference picture and this is the finished result.
descriptionHtml:
MERRY CHRISTMAS!!!

It\'s December 25th and so I think presents are in order for all the good girls and boys!

Here is a Woodcutter\'s Axe and a Mining Pick that match (as best as I can conceive) your OP.  They are cleaner, newer, more ornate based on the requesting party\'s reference picture:
[img]http://www.aceros-de-hispania.com/image/paul-chen-swords/1901-viking-axe/1901-vikinga-axe.JPG[/img]

[u][b]Installation Instructions:[/b][/u]
Download the rar file and unpack the rar into: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

[u][b]NOTE:[/b][/u] This overwrites the default textures so make backups if you want to remove it later.

[u][b]Conflicts:[/b][/u] None known.

[u][b]CREDITS: [/b][/u]
Texture: Lady_Stark_
Unwrapping / Testing:  KatoPlato

In the spirit of the Season, please come back and endorse / vote for me if you like it.  This is my first mod and done for a Nexus Member Request.  Thank you for your time.
author: Lady_Stark_ and KatoPlato
